channel.title: Worn Equipment Screen
channel.description:
On my client it shows all +120 for my bonuses in my Worn Equipment interface. I have the code to write the bonuses to that interface, and I test another client which loaded them fine. I used an interface editor to make sure the IDs were the same for interface text, and they were.
My question is why does my client output +120 no matter what in the bonuses column?

item.title: Worn Equipment Screen
